price: Mutãnen Nũhu sun ƙaryata, a gabãninsu (mutãnen yanzu) da ma'abũta Rassi, *da Samũdãwa.
arabic: كَذَّبَتۡ قَبۡلَهُمۡ قَوۡمُ نُوحٖ وَأَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلرَّسِّ وَثَمُودُ
footnotes: * Rassi sunan wata rijĩya ce. Mutãnenta na zaune a gefenta da dabbõbinsu, sunã bauta wa gumãka, aka aika musu wani Annabi, anã ce da shi Hanzala bn safwan kõ kuma waninsa.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: kadhabat qablahum qawmu nūḥin wa-aṣḥābu al-rasi wathamūdu
